document_data.caption: Denia Vesdar, spy for the [[Zhentarim]].
document_data.name: Denia Vesdar
document_data.aliases:
Lady Mara Kulenov
Miri Greycastle
Natali Nemetsk
document_data.mainbody: '''Denia Vesdar''' was a spy for the [[Zhentarim]], who worked in the [[Tower of the Blades]] in the city of [[Mulmaster]]. She had attained her rank after proving herself time and again, beginning her career as a mere soldier within [[Zhentil Keep]].
document_data.Appearance: Standing about 5' 6" (1.6 m) tall with relatively plain features and a pale complexion, Denia's unassuming features served her well in assuming the various identities that were required to complete her missions for the Zhents.
